name: YouTube - DT
description:
This is a style wich is created by Dave Tucker.

Install now the perfect cursor:
Cursor 4 the Web - DT | WINDOWS/APPLE

user.name: Dave Tucker
user.about:
Hi I'm Dave Tucker,
and I like it to create some styles for some Websites.

View my newest Style, the style 149854 or style 159235 and the newest version of style 131618.

If you want a crazy style, view this one: style 132863.

additional_info:
v1.2.0 - navigation, searchfield, cinema mode
v1.3.0 - visibility of the version
v1.4.0 - subscriber numbers changing the colors in rainbow colors
v1.4.1 - revision of the subscriber numbers (colors: gray & white)
v1.4.2 - revision of the subscriber numbers (the animation is slower)
v1.5.0 - the video has now a shadow and a frame
v1.7.6 - new look (e.g. background image)
v1.8.0 - choose your own background image
v1.8.1 - a few changes on the video settings
v1.9.0 - now with adblocker
v1.9.1 - improvement of the adblocker
v1.9.2 - the loading color are now in rainbow colors
v1.9.3 - the appearance of the search bar can be changed as desired
v1.9.4 - some new features
v1.10.0 - revision of the design
v1.10.1 - subscribe button has a better design and the loading ring is red
